attributes.additional_details: I am campaigning to stop abortion now and reduce the rates of it. Abortion, after a certain time period, is like killing a baby whether it is in the real life or not and that can be seen as a crime. To reduce the rates of abortion, the government should reduce the time limit for an abortion from 24 weeks to 8 weeks, where the foetus is still a clot of blood and can feel no pain.
